Issue.creator: flyingtiger
Issue.summary: It is the BlockPublisher that sends the block out through Gossip, not Consensus.BlcokPublisher
Issue.description: The journal diagram in http://intelledger.github.io/architecture/journal.html has a bug, that diagram shows an arrow from Consensus.BlcokPublisher to Gossip, but it is is the BlockPublisher that sends the block out through Gossip.
